result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. JAMES M TRIGGS

records.addlTxt:
8:32 AM Defendant JAMES M TRIGGS appeared by video, in custody at the Dane County Jail.  Attorney Emma K Blankschein in court for JAMES M TRIGGS.  Prosecuting attorney Christian A. Gossett in court for the State of Wisconsin. Information on file.  Defense acknowledges receipt of information and waives reading.  Noting a special appearance and enters a not guilty plea.  Court notes victim's rights are complied with.  Defense advises matter is close to resolution and requests just a plea/sentencing date.  Defendant waives right to appear in person for all upcoming hearings. Court orders bond to continue.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 10:30 am.
for 10/28/22 Arraignment forwarded to Winnebago County Sheriff's Office - Transport Division to process by JA.
Writ for 10/28/22 Argn forwarded to Judge for signature.

10:00 AM Defendant JAMES M TRIGGS appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Emma K Blankschein in court for JAMES M TRIGGS.  Prosecuting attorney Tracy Ann Paider in court for the State of Wisconsin. The defendant authorized the Court to send text message reminders of upcoming court hearings. The Court did confirm with the State that they are in compliance with Marsy's Law. The Court notes there is no victim present that wishes to make a statement. Record closed 1002
Arraignment scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
